data.title: Congressman Fallon's Summer 2024 Town Hall Tour stops in Bonham, Sherman
data.meta_description: Congressman Pat Fallon presents a Congressional Patriot Award to Jo Ransom during a town hall meeting Tuesday, August 6, 2024, in Bonham. Fallon discussed several of the hot topics facing Congress and then opened up the floor for a question and answer period.
data.text:
Fannin County, Texas -- Congressman Pat Fallon's Summer 2024 Town Hall Tour made stops in Bonham and Sherman on Tuesday, August 6 to visit with constituents, present awards and take questions from the audience.

In Bonham, several people were honored with Congressional Patriot Awards, including Mark Sanderson, Randy Moore, Joe Ward, Joyce Buchannan and Jo Ransom. Congressman Fallon said the awards were the result of a lifetime of achievements.

Fallon discussed several of the hot topics facing Congress and then opened up the floor for a question and answer period.

After the meeting in Bonham, Fallon traveled to Sherman for his second town hall meeting Tuesday night.

Up next are town hall meetings at the Rains County Courthouse, Rockwall, Cooper and Plano.
